info.name: Airbnb Map width 65%
info.description: This enables 65% Map width for the Airbnb search. Not as good as the airbnb-beautifier script from https://github.com/docomoz/airbnb-beautifier
info.additionalInfo:
-- Updated / Upgraded on 28.1.2017 --
Usual div updating for the new map div._1s8r520 ... Probably changes every month or so, so I recommend editing it on your own when it changes.
-- Updated / Upgraded on 28.1.2017 --
    Airbnb changing div names.. changed accordingly. Also some new "loading screen" added by Airbnb. Probably needs client javascript to fully disable...
-- Updated / Upgraded on 8.10.2017 --
    Made the handling of the search results menu bar less wide, and also changed the element it changes to when user starts scrolling
